gist.headline: The hive finds its voice
gist.blurb: We've added ElevenLabs to our choir! Now you can turn text into lifelike speech with our new OpenAI-compatible audio endpoint.
gist.summary: Added a new `/v1/audio/speech` endpoint backed by ElevenLabs, including voice mapping for OpenAI compatibility and usage tracking.
gist.impact: Developers can now generate high-quality speech using ElevenLabs voices through the standard Pollinations API interface.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot recording audio. Represents the new Text-to-Speech capability. Symbols: Vintage microphone, sound waves, musical notes.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot speaking into a vintage silver microphone. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Visual sound waves ripple out as pixelated musical notes. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
